The Great Start Readiness Program (GSRP) is a FREE Michigan's state-funded preschool program for four-year-old children with factors which may place them at risk of educational failure.

This year we are offering a 100% virtual option, a hybrid schedule two day in- person 2 day virtual option, and a 4 day a week in-person option.

Tuition Free

The program is tuition free for families of eligible children who turn 4 years of age by Dec. 1st.

4 Free full days with optional wrap around (for a fee)

Teacher qualifications

Each classroom of 16-18 students has an experienced, highly qualified teaching staff!

Lead Teachers hold a minimum of a Bachelor's Degree in Early Childhood Development.

Associate Teachers hold a minimum of a CDA, a credential in early childhood development.

8 to 1 ratio of adults to students. Max of 16 per classroom.

And...We are now a HighScope curriculum program!!

Hi Tiger Families! Please share this on FB!

Blood donations are more important than ever during this time. We have worked closely with the Red Cross to continue to support this lifesaving event. We are in need of healthy donors and due to the circumstances, only scheduled appointments are available. There will be no walk in‚Äôs permitted.
